description.en:
Sparky Tractor Pack, Includes:
Sparked New Holland Braud e9070L Sparked Case IH Magnum Sparked Case IH Steiger 4WD (2.5.0.0) Sparked Deutz-Fahr Series 7 Sparked Fendt Vario 1000 * Sparked John Deere Series 6R Sparked John Deere Series 8RX * Sparked John Deere Series 9RT * Sparked John Deere XUV e865M Sparked Claas Lexion 8000 Sparked Massey Ferguson 7720S Sparked Mack Superliner 1979 Sparked New Holland TK4.80 Electric Power Sparked Claas Trion 750 Sparked Krone BigX 1180 * Sparked JCB Fastrac 4220 Sparked JCB Fastrac 8330 Sparked Hardi Rubicon 9000 w/ Spot Spray & Sensors * Sparked New Holland T8 (2.5.0.0) Sparked New Holland T9 (2.5.0.0) Sparked Valtra T Series (2.5.0.0)
* Added in 2.0.0
description.de:

Sparked New Holland Braud e9070L Sparked Case IH Magnum Sparked Case IH Steiger 4WD (2.5.0.0) Sparked Deutz-Fahr Series 7 Sparked Fendt Vario 1000 * Sparked John Deere Series 6R Sparked John Deere Series 8RX * Sparked John Deere Series 9RT * Sparked John Deere XUV e865M Sparked Claas Lexion 8000 Sparked Massey Ferguson 7720S Sparked Mack Superliner 1979 Sparked New Holland TK4.80 Electric Power Sparked Claas Trion 750 Sparked Krone BigX 1180 * Sparked JCB Fastrac 4220 Sparked JCB Fastrac 8330 Sparked Hardi Rubicon 9000 w/ Spot Spray & Sensors * Sparked New Holland T8 (2.5.0.0) Sparked New Holland T9 (2.5.0.0) Sparked Valtra T Series (2.5.0.0)
